timeline.bodyText: Just hope it will never gets 40 degrees C 😉
timeline.author: Hilbrand

replies.bodyText: The reported temp can never be 0. This would be -40°C, I think there is some room for the implementation :-)
replies.author: markus7017

replies.bodyText: Ah you're right I read that the wrong way..
replies.author: Hilbrand

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to retry 3 times in a row without some wait time? (Not that add sleep would be a solution though...)
timeline.author: Hilbrand

replies.bodyText:
There is no delay in submitting commands: 3 retries in a row
only the status poll has delays, which means "unit was not available over the last 3 poll cycles"
I think that makes sense. Nevertheless I changed the code to use a local variable rather than the instance variable used to count the status poll retries.
replies.author: markus7017
